title: Natalie Halimi Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Natalie Halimi? Check out all of Natalie Halimi's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogNatalie Halimi Natalie Halimi Natalie Halimi is the Head of Marketing Communications & Education at Similarweb. With over 10 years of experience in marketing, Natalie has promoted services and products in the B2C and B2B arenas, in various industries.
